title: Rihanna drops series of Fenty outift posts on Instagram
text:
The excitement surrounding Rihanna's Fenty fashion line is flourishing.

She released the luxury collection in May and recently posting a series of photos on Instagram featuring items from it.

She began with a photo of herself wearing the Wasabi Leather Mini Skirt paired with a sheer turtleneck top and a white bag.

Fans of Rihanna's leather look immediately responded with enthusiasm. Kittycash left a comment simply saying, "So classy."

The post has received over 3 million likes, and it was the first of five more looks posted shortly thereafter.

In the next post, Rihanna is sporting a variety of grays from head-to-toe, including a belted blazer and Fenty Oyster Gray Jersey Corset Boots.

For the third look, she is posing in what she calls her "Favorite Fenty Pants," which are labeled as Leather Skinny Pants with Slits.

For the fourth Fenty outfit post, Rihanna stuns in a sexy leather-look and dark shades.

In the second-to-last look, Rihanna rocks a stylish corduroy blazer, layered with a black hoodie and shorts.

For the final look, Rihanna is wearing a chic army fatigue cardigan and brown slide-in sandals.
description: Rihanna posted six amazing looks from her Fenty fashion collection on Instagram.
